title: Looking for the font Pollen from Brazilian type designer Eduardo Berliner
content:
Hello,

I'm a dutch graphic designer and i'm looking for the Pollen font.

I saw that someone before me already posted a question on this forum.

Can anyone help me to this font?

With regards,

Rob Stolte,  
 [www.autobahn.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20101121045329/http:/www.autobahn.nl/ "www.autobahn.nl")
author: autobahn

comments.content:
There is a speciman chart of it at:  
 [http://www.personal.rdg.ac.uk/~lts98gl/MATD/Pollen\_specimen.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20101121045329/http:/www.personal.rdg.ac.uk/~lts98gl/MATD/Pollen_specimen.pdf "http://www.personal.rdg.ac.uk/~lts98gl/MATD/Pollen\_specimen.pdf")

perhaps someone from that website can help you?

But the last thing I can find was he was a student when he drew Pollen and he put this out in 2003  
 [http://www.typeculture.com/academic\_resource/articles\_essays/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101121045329/http:/www.typeculture.com/academic_resource/articles_essays/ "http://www.typeculture.com/academic\_resource/articles\_essays/")

Eduardo Berliner

Brazilian ex-student at the University of Reading who designed Pollen (2003). - from  
 [http://cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/brasilfonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20101121045329/http:/cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/brasilfonts.html "http://cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/brasilfonts.html")

Maybe the U of Reading could help?

Funny, most of the inquiries from the search on Yahoo and Google seem to come from typophile.com

Good luck - and if you find him, please share -
